original_text: And the Lord said unto Moses, Get thee up into this mount Abarim, and see the land which I have given unto the children of Israel.
korean_text: 여호와께서 모세에게 이르시되 너는 이 아바림 산에 올라가서 내가 이스라엘 자손에게 준 땅을 바라보라

sentences.original_text: And the Lord said unto Moses
Get thee up into this mount Abarim
which I have given unto the children of Israel
